column4: I need help, my problem orignally was that I had no splash screen during bootup.  I came in here and someone told me to install startup-manager mess around with the settings, which I did.  When I browsed the application the check box for tthe splash screen was already checked so I changed the resolution to 1024x768 from 800x600.  I then rebooted and cannot reach the login screen now, it just sits at a black screen after say
hes trying to access a external USB Vfat HD. :)
i should say ugly, its not the best looking though
